mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_USERS WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USERS ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, USER_GENDER, USER_PHONE, USER_CARMODEL, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID, UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender}, #{userPhone}, #{userCarmodel}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USERS SET USER_PWD = #{newPwd}, USER_MODIFY_TOKEN = NULL, UPDATED_ID = #{userId}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_MODIFY_TOKEN = #{token}

UPDATE TB_USERS SET USER_NAME = #{userName}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_BIRTH = TO_DATE(#{userBirth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}, USER_CARMODEL = #{userCarmodel}, USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, UPDATED_ID = #{userId}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
